Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: StudentScoreJudgementAgainstStandard/Grade, StudentScoreJudgementAgainstStandard/TeacherJudgement, requested by DET NSW, to allow a broader range of evaluations for student performance against a learning standard than just a numeric score.
4217 Currency Names And Code Elements: added SLE: Leone (new), .
Visa Sub Class: tidied presentation, use consistently "(No longer isssued)" for discontinued Visas.
